form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE, A17 2212 360 (DD

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90012 January 31, 1968 Please refer to: A17 212 360 (DD) Mrs. Helen Halsey, 1114 Calle Vista Drive, Beverly Hills, California Dear Mrs. Halsey: This office is interested in learning whether or not Yuk WONG whose entry into the United States for permanent residence was initiated by you as prospective employer, is presently so-employed. You may wish to make a notation on this letter and return it to us in the enclosed self- addressed envelope which requires no postage. In the event you prefer to call us our telephone number is #633-2782 - please ask for Mrs. Rasp. Your prompt reply will be appreciated. Sincerely, George District George Kit Director Rosenberg York Wong is with me B.T. Encl
